answers.text:
Our City Manager, Tom Bonfield, introduced what he called a Culture of Service - our organizational renewal and employee engagement initiative. There are 3 points to this triangle: Service to Self, Service to Co-workers, and Service to Community - with tenets under each point. We're seeing increased awareness and positive energy as this initiative spreads in our organization.
